body_content.explanation: the use of money, time, or effort:
examples: Buying a bigger car has proved to be well worth the expense.
We've just had a new garage built at great expense.
We went on holiday at my father's expense (= he paid for it).
It's silly to go to the expense of (= spend money on) buying new clothes when you don't really need them.

body_content.explanation: something that makes you spend money:
examples: Our biggest expense this year was our summer holiday.
We need to cut down on our expenses.

body_content.explanation: money that you spend when you are doing your job, that your employer will pay back to you:
examples: I need to get my expenses approved.
